entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
